column1: #pickup 1 coil 1 polarity l2: normal / r2: reverse
#pickup 1 coil 2 polarity l2: normal / r2: reverse
#pickup 1 r: parallel or 2 / l: series or 1
#pickup 2 coil 1 polarity l2: normal / r2: reverse
#pickup 2 coil 2 polarity l2: normal / r2: reverse
#pickup 2 r: parallel or 4 / l: series or 3
#series/parallel switcher A for pickup switcher position middle l: parallel / r: series
#3-position pickup switcher l: pickup 1 / r: pickup 2
